languages.text: "В некоторых отчетах отмечены случаи {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}тесного сотрудничества{/d} протектората фон Валанциус с преступной организацией, замешанной в хладном торге — Миссией Касбаллики. Запятнать себя дружбой с подобными личностями... недостойно высшего слуги Империума".

traits.locale_text: "В некоторых отчетах отмечены случаи тесного сотрудничества торговой империи фон Валанциус с преступной организации хладных торговцев, промышляющих контрабандой ксеноартефактов — Миссией Касбалликой. Запятнать себя дружбой с подобными личностями... недостойно высшего слуги Империума".

languages.text: "Some reports note instances of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}close cooperation{/d} between the von Valancius protectorate and a crime syndicate involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Sullying oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "В некоторых отчетах отмечены случаи {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}тесного сотрудничества{/d} протектората фон Валанциус с преступной организацией, замешанной в хладном торге — Миссией Касбаллики. Запятнать себя дружбой с подобными личностями... недостойно высшего слуги Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Some reports note the cases of close cooperation between the von Valancius protectorate and a criminal organization involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Tainting oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."

"Some reports note instances of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}close cooperation{/d} between the von Valancius protectorate and a crime syndicate involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Sullying oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."

languages.text: « Certains rapports font état d'une {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}coopération étroite{/d} entre le protectorat von Valancius et un syndicat criminel impliqué dans le Commerce Froid, la Mission de la Kasballica. Se corrompre aux côtés de tels individus... est indigne d'{mf|un éminent serviteur|une éminente servante} de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Some reports note instances of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}close cooperation{/d} between the von Valancius protectorate and a crime syndicate involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Sullying oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Certains rapports font état d'une coopération étroite entre le protectorat von Valancius et un syndicat criminel impliqué dans le Commerce Froid, la Mission de la Kasballica. Se corrompre aux côtés de tels individus... est indigne d'{mf|un éminent serviteur|une éminente servante} de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: “有报告指出，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝参与了冷市贸易，与卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团有着{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}密切合作{/d}。行商浪人与这样的犯罪分子打交道，玷污了自己的名声……不配成为帝国光荣的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "Some reports note instances of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}close cooperation{/d} between the von Valancius protectorate and a crime syndicate involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Sullying oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “有报告指出，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝参与了冷市贸易，与卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团有着密切合作。行商浪人与这样的犯罪分子打交道，玷污了自己的名声……不配成为帝国光荣的仆人。”

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は、闇取引に関与した犯罪シンジケート、カスバリカ聖務団と{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}密接に協力し合っていた{/d}という報告が数件ある。そのような者たちと関係を結んで自らを辱めるとは…帝国の高貴なる従者としてあるまじきことだ」
languages.original_text: "Some reports note instances of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}close cooperation{/d} between the von Valancius protectorate and a crime syndicate involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Sullying oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は、闇取引に関与した犯罪シンジケート、カスバリカ聖務団と{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}密接に協力し合っていた{/d}という報告が数件ある。そのような者たちと関係を結んで自らを辱めるとは…帝国の高貴なる従者としてあるまじきことだ」

languages.text: "Es gibt Berichte einer {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}engen Zusammenarbeit{/d} zwischen dem Protektorat von Valancius und einem Verbrechersyndikat des Kalthandels, der Kasballica-Mission. Den Schulterschluss mit solchen Individuen zu suchen und sich derart zu beflecken ... ist eines so hohen Dieners des Imperiums unwürdig."
languages.original_text: "Some reports note instances of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}close cooperation{/d} between the von Valancius protectorate and a crime syndicate involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Sullying oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Es liegen Berichte vor, die eine Zusammenarbeit zwischen dem Protektorat von Valancius und einem Verbrechersyndikat des Kalthandels, der Kasballica, nahelegen. Den Schulterschluss mit solchen Individuen zu suchen und sich derart zu beflecken ... ist eines so hohen Dieners des Imperiums unwürdig."

"Es gibt Berichte einer engen Zusammenarbeit zwischen dem Protektorat von Valancius und einem Verbrechersyndikat des Kalthandels, der Kasballica-Mission. Den Schulterschluss mit solchen Individuen zu suchen und sich derart zu beflecken ... ist eines so hohen Dieners des Imperiums unwürdig."

languages.text: «Ciertos informes señalan casos de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}estrecha colaboración{/d} entre el protectorado von Valancius y un sindicato del crimen implicado en el comercio frío, la Misión Kasballica. Mancillarse {mf|uno mismo|una misma} codeándose con tales individuos... es impropio de {mf|un siervo|una sierva} tan ilustre del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Some reports note instances of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}close cooperation{/d} between the von Valancius protectorate and a crime syndicate involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Sullying oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Ciertos informes señalan casos de estrecha colaboración entre el protectorado de Von Valancius y un sindicato del crimen implicado en el comercio frío, la Misión Kasballica. Mancillarse {mf|uno mismo|una misma} codeándose con tales individuos... es impropio de {mf|un siervo|una sierva} tan ilustre del Imperium».

languages.text: "Bazı raporlarda, von Valancius protektorası ve Soğuk Ticaret'le ilgilenen suç örgütü Kasballica Misyonu arasında {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}iş birliği gerçekleştirilen{/d} durumlar olduğu belirtilmektedir. Kişinin böylesi şahıslarla dirsek temasında olup kendisini kirletmesi, İmparatorluk'un bu derece üst düzey bir hizmetkârına yakışmayan bir hareket teşkil etmektedir."
languages.original_text: "Some reports note instances of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}close cooperation{/d} between the von Valancius protectorate and a crime syndicate involved in the Cold Trade, the Kasballica Mission. Sullying oneself by rubbing shoulders with such individuals... is unworthy of such an elevated servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı raporlarda, von Valancius protektorası ve Soğuk Ticaret'le ilgilenen suç örgütü Kasballica Misyonu arasında iş birliği gerçekleştirilen durumlar olduğu belirtiliyor. Kişinin böylesi şahıslarla omuz omuza hareket ederek kendisini kirletmesi, İmparatorluk'un bu derece üst düzel bir hizmetkârına yakışan bir hareket değildir."
